What other feedback do you have for us r: One suggestion I have for your credit union regarding your deposit products is to offer more flexibility in terms of account options. For example, some people may prefer a savings account with a higher interest rate but are willing to maintain a higher minimum balance, while others may prefer a savings account with a lower interest rate but no minimum balance requirement.
